tool_description: Random 12-word generator in BiP32 and BiP39 Standard
title: Random Phrase Generator

api_list.name: Get 24 Word
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-phrase-generator.p.rapidapi.com/get24word"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-phrase-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
